评论详情: I was looking for some sort of "belt" to tuck a loose flowy shirt into over a dress, and this was perfect. The material is flexible, yet thick enough to hide fabric folds underneath. The design is beautiful too. It fits exactly how it said it would. I ordered a 22"-26" because I wanted something more snug on my 26.5" waist, and it worked out great. One thing I would mention is the "white" option is slightly off-white, but not to an obvious degree.

I bought this for the Gasparilla and then I found out it can go with anything and or everything Love the color, You really get a good item for the value of the money, adjustability is perfect, durability awesome color is fantastic for the stretch ability it could tend to be a little bit stretchier I am 5'6 and 220 lb but the size is true to fit

I wore this to a dance and I got so many compliments! It also stayed in place while I was dancing and jumping up and down. I should mention that it doesn’t breathe so by the end of the night the inside of the leather part was a little damp because of sweat. I really think it’s a great value for the money. Sorry my photo isn’t the best quality, but you can see how it looked in my pirate inspired outfit. Oh and where I wore it which was around my lower ribs (kinda around the diaphragm where your ribs part and stuff (idk)) has a circumference of 29 inches at the largest point. I was able to breathe comfortably even with it there.
Tiny and not the color stated It's more ivory with white lace and white elastic on back. Not a good color combo ESPECIALLY when it's supposed to be all white.
Size fit perfect! Beautiful quality too!
Perfect accessory to finish my halloween costume
Great product; beautiful belt! Came quickly, looked and felt as expected. Just like the photo. Very good quality.
I get lots of compliments!! Fits and feels great. Stays in place. Great value
This is a bit smaller than I thought, but, it fits great and it looks cool.
True to size and durable.

This was a great little corset. Kept me sucked in all day. Didn’t fold over, kept its shape. Also- it didn’t absorb my sweat which I’m grateful for because who likes to see other peoples’ sweat? I’ll preface that I live in a hot state, I don’t think it was the corset itself making me sweat!
Love this cute for any dress or blouse you wanna style up a little. Wore it with a green dress to a bridal shower got tons of compliments.

This was exactly what we needed and it fit perfectly on my skinny 12-year-old daughter. It’s actually much better quality than I thought it would be and it doesn’t look cheap at all. We bought an $80 corset for her to wear on Halloween but bought this one just in case it didn’t come on time and she actually ended up wearing this one even though the other one arrived.

This waist belt corset is easy to use, and comfortable, it has a little bit of stretch to it but be sure to check your measurements with the chart and order accordingly.  The belt is nice and dresses up other outfits, we purchased this for a costume.  We also have the black color and it has been worn with several everyday outfits.

This was everything I wanted it to be and more. It fit perfect. It was a little on the tighter side, but that’s what I wanted. The front is slightly adjustable in the sense of tightness, as you can loosen it a little to allow some breathing room, but it’s only by about .5 inch. Would get more in other colors if available (need to look)
Love this belt it has 3 snaps to fasten & don't come loose
So cute, fits incredible. Love the material too, easy to take off and put on
Great fit! Easy to put on because of the snaps on the back. I love it! Good quality.
Used for my wedding
You get what you pay for.
I am tiny (have to shop the kids section half the time) and this belt sat perfectly around my waist for a ren faire outfit.

Mom of 3 pushing 40 sooo I like the way it covered my waist. Performance was great for a night out with my daughters at a concert in Las Vegas. Provided the stability I was looking for. Easy to use, versatile with other outfits and good quality. I didn’t spend an arm and a leg to easily accessorize my outfit. Cost effective and cute. Thanks again!
Bought for a costume and was very pleased. Very comfortable and good quality. True to size

I love this corset, Its comfy and I love it for breaking up the seam between my top and a skirt and i would give 5 stars but one of the metal eyelets slipped out after only a month of occasional wearing
Me encantó.  Me tallo perfecto con mi vestido.

For some reason I assumed there would be a bit of adjustability from the front, but it is for looks. The belt is cute though. Make sure to hold the top or bottom closed while snapping the others so it won't pop open.
No estira no es buen material
This corset belt was perfect for our photoshoot and very flattering!
Cute belt. It does tend to roll in the back but I still like it a lot.
I use it for cosplay it's good
It came in pretty quickly! And although I was worried about the sizing, it fit me perfectly and is nice and stretchy! You just have to make sure that you order within your waist size :)

I bought it for a ren faire outfit but I’ve since wore it with many other outfits. It synched a lot of my dresses and shirts that were too big so I had more of a waist and I used it on a flowy spaghetti strap tank top that was too big in the bust to kind of tuck and hold the excess fabric so it fit better. I would buy another, my partner wore it one of the days at the faire because it matched her outfit better than her belt. I ordered this specific one because I waited till the last minute and this one was supposed to arrive the fastest but I really liked the quality and would purchase again if I was getting one in another color or for someone else.
10/10 fits, got here on time, Very cute!

评论概述: Perfect! I want it in every color.
评论详情: I am 5’8 and 440 pounds. I wear a size 30 pant and this belt fit perfect. I was afraid because I am hard to fit but it stretches perfect and looks beautiful. I am going to buy it in every color.
Really cute… bought for a costume. Seems to run big, but a good item.
Honestly was about what i expected - it is cheaply made, but it worked for my needs.

I got it in red and I think it's a super cute versatile piece. I used it for a festival and it was pretty breathable. I went based on the size chart and it fit well. Keep in mind the back is a thick elastic that clasps. For me it fit slightly tighter but the clasp held well for me (28" waist, 38" hips)
It clips on from the back if you didn’t know so you cant tighten it that much but it does have an elastic so it molds to your body.
Very cute addition to my witchy fall outfit. Very excited it was adjustable for sizing and very stretchy!!

I bought it for the renaissance fair but the first one had one button fallen off already. The second one they sent was good. It’s very elastic and I like the color. It’s cheap so worth the money overall

I wore this for my Halloween costume, and I loved how it fit on me. I was a bit worried that it wouldn't fit me, because I tend to need smaller clothes. It fit really well, but it did slip down a little bit. Overall, super cute, and would recommend
This wasn't what I expected, so I returned it.

We needed something to pull a too-big dress tighter on my daughter - back clips ruined the way the dress laid so I was looking for different options. I thought this corset belt would be overkill, but it ended up pulling the whole outfit together - surprise! We got the smallest size for my slender kids size 10 daughter & it worked perfectly, we used the listed measurements & they were accurate. Daughter loved it & said it was comfortable, she wore it for hours on multiple days & it stayed strong.

I rarely write Amazon reviews, but had to for this. Great price, good material and well made. True to size description. I’m a 38’’ waist so I got the 37-41, and it fits around without being tight which was my goal.

It's really cute, well made for the price, but it scrunches up really bad everytime I move or sit, I'm constantly having to fix it which makes it annoying to wear. I've added boning to fix this but it you aren't crafty enough to do that you might pick a sturdier belt so you aren't fiddling with it all day.
n/a
This is a great belt to punch up any outfit. It's easy to use and adjust.
This fit so well and looks high quality it’s absolutely beautiful the details are 👌

Pretty corset belt, not at all flimsy, seems well made, and, fit as expected. Looks great! Using it for a wedding and in the future, I’m sure, for Renaissance Fair. I was skeptical because of the small amount of ratings, but glad I took a chance.
It fits great! So glad I got this!
I bought it expecting it to be Cheap, but looks and fits well I bought it for my daughter, and fits amazing, and its adjustable straps on the front help.
